basics.description: This is the portfolio of Michael Pineda, a professional in film and television with experience in audiovisual content production, video editing and photography. I am currently looking for new job opportunities in the field of audiovisual production and photography.
basics.name: Michael Pineda Cárdenas
basics.label: Professional in Film and Television Direction and Production
basics.summary: I am passionate about the world of cinema and audiovisual creation, and my goal is to perfect my skills both in the workplace and artistically to reach a high professional level in this industry. My main focus is to create high-quality audiovisual pieces that not only reflect my creativity and technical skill, but also communicate my commitment to excellence in every project.
basics.summary2: I am constantly looking for new opportunities to learn and develop skills that allow me to overcome my limitations and grow as a professional. I aspire to produce content that speaks for itself, that demonstrates my passion for cinema and that helps me become a better filmmaker every day.
basics.summary3: My ultimate goal is to direct and write an original film work that inspires and excites audiences around the world.

work.name: Larry y Rass
work.summary: Presented in animatic format as a degree work in 2022
add: During my university career, I have excelled in the development of key skills in audiovisual editing and editing, as well as in the writing and structuring of scripts. In addition, I have acquired a solid mastery in the use of audio and video editing programs
My interest and skill in Cut Out animation have become highlights of my experience. I have had the opportunity to carry out the production of a short film using this technique.
I have also explored similar techniques, such as pixilation, which I used in the creation of a video clip.
